hero-description: I'm a web developer and I create user interfaces
about-description-part-one:
For more than 3 years, I am engaged in web development.
I sincerely like to take up new tasks and understand them.
I get great pleasure from writing code and watching the results of its implementation.
I try to keep moving forward and don't stop at what I have learned.
about-description-part-two:
HTML5 / CSS3 / SCSS / Tailwind CSS /
JavaScript / TypeScript / React JS / Redux /
styled-components / Material UI /
Node JS / Express JS / MongoDB / PostgreSQL

- in my work I use the BEM methodology and OOP principles
- experienced in working with PHP and creating customized themes on WordPress
- I actively use the Git version control system
- use Sass/SCSS for faster site layout
- use an ESLint linter
- to build the project files, I use Webpack
- have skills in cross-browser and adaptive layout
- also work with layouts from Figma
- I love Pixel Perfect
project-description-one: Movie App project with cards about movies received from API.
project-description-two: YouTube Clone Application built with MERN Stack.
project-description-three: App about VR devices built with Next.js.
